title: Asian Stocks Dip on Korea Tariffs, Yen Holds Gains: Markets Wrap
description: Asian equities edged lower as tariff concerns resurfaced after President Donald Trump threatened to raise levies on South Korean goods. The yen held its gains.
content: Asian equities edged lower as tariff concerns resurfaced after President Donald Trump threatened to raise levies on South Korean goods. The yen held its gains.
